descriptionNullable:
# Context
Retail dataset of a global superstore for 4 years.

**In this Dataset we would like to use time series forecast to predict the superstore's sale and profit **
Time series analysis deals with time series based data to extract patterns for predictions and other characteristics of the data.
It uses a model for forecasting future values in a small time frame based on previous observations. 
It is widely used for non-stationary data, such as economic data, weather data, stock prices, and retail sales forecasting.

# **Dataset**
Row ID : ID 
Order ID :Order ID of each Customer.
Order Date :  The date customer ordered the product
Ship Date : The date product is shipped 
Ship Mode: Shipping Mode of the product:  First class,
                                                                         Same day,
                                                                         Second class,
                                                                         Standard class
Customer ID : ID to identify each Customer.
Customer Name :Name of the Customer.
Segment : Customer segmentation: Customer,
                                                            Corporate,
                                                            Home-office
Country : United State:Country of residence of the Customer.
City : City of  the Customer.
State :  State  of the Customer.
Postal Code: Postal Code of Customer.
Region : Region of residence: Central
                                                  East
                                                  South
                                                  West
Product ID :ID of the Product.
Category : Category of the product ordered: Furniture
                                                                           Office Supplies
                                                                           Technology
Sub-Category :Sub-Category of the product ordered
Product Name : Name of the Product
Sales : Sales of the Product
Quantity: Quantity of the Product
Discount : Percentage of Discount 
Profit : Profit/Loss of the Product
title: Dataset: Superstore (2015-2018)
